alert.note: Alert for Adjuntas; Anasco; Lares; Las Marias; San Sebastian; Utuado (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 2:07PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Adjuntas, Anasco, Lares, Las Marias, San Sebastian and Utuado. * WHEN...Until 415 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 107 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Adjuntas, Lares, Utuado, San Sebastian, Anasco, Las Marias, Hato Arriba, La Playa, Maricao, Juncal, Cayuco and Espino. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adjuntas; Anasco; Lares; Las Marias; San Sebastian; Utuado
